title: Shitted on Em (feat. Kendrick Lamar)
lyrics:
10 Contributors
Shitted on Em (feat. Kendrick Lamar) Lyrics
Philadelphia rapper Privaledge teams up with Compton native Kendrick Lamar to deliver a hard freestyle. The two artists spit their rhymes over the beat from Nicki Minaj’s 2011 song “Did It On'em.” Privaledge… Read More 
[Verse 1: Privaledge]
Yo, I said back up on my body shit
Like I ain't' even body it
The Maserati doors flip back like a karate kick
I gotta get that and party with that
I'm prolly with the same ones
I come in this game with, I'm mobbin' with
All my niggas thorough from DC, to Cali shit
V-A to P-A, to G-A to D-E, to D-A
Want to catch a nigga, see somebody slip
Circle so tight
It's even harder to get out of it
People say I'm border line crazy
But I'm proud of it, everything I'm destined to be
They couldn't swallow it, the hollow shit
Or double barrow pump'll get him out of it
50 Caliber and magazines couldn't model it
A monument I stand tall
Something like I'm Solomon
Coppers trying to see my Facebook, so they follow em'
All up on Myspace, the fuck out of my face
Been repping 5'2 ever since I was 5'8
5'6, 5'2 the 40 divide you
Caught em in sky blue, now he repping that piru
Shorty is pie too he don't want it with my crew
You ain't' gotta fuck with Dennis Rodman to die dude
I played the side they wanted me as a pippin
I told em' I'ma ball, somebody must of been tripping
Somebody must of been sipping
The same niggas looking at me now
Like damn I knew that nigga was shittin'
What I'm spittin' real rap
Got a fake nigga shivering, cause all them punchlines
Is disquise for them bitchin, look at how we living
No chef up in the kitchen, but bitches be over three times a week making chicken
Learned how to rap in the hood and seen a vision
Everybody slacked in the hood, I had a mission
Now giving back to the hood is my ambition
So why live back in the hood, be like an engine
I don't understand that, I don't follow I be trending
Give a model my opinion, one that I ain't' even have to share
Black Suit, Vladimir, Pen stripe like the magic wear
Thunder Game, they think I'm wearing the magic gear
Court side every game, that ass appear
After the game, disappear, that's magic yeah
Still fuck with the same niggas that got me here
And I even on yet, look at how I'm doin yet
Am I drawn yet? reading paper like a coin mech
Look at how they made the beat, look at how I'm on that
Corner-back, I'm a quarter back you catching all of that
Wide-receiver still running thinking that I lobbed it back



[Verse 2: Kendrick Lamar]
Uh, Hannibal Lector pressure inside my veins

You nothing but a tangible wrestler
Stressed to entertain, I intertwine
With rhymes, while circling candles in the rain
Cause a seance, call my great aunt
And tell her I'm insane
I love the night life, Dracula, eat parasites with my fangs
Knowing my vice, advice-giving by killers who obtain
Bullets and dice, gamble with it
Put digits on your name
Price on your head
Sell it for cheap, like an eBay domain

Blucker, ey fucker ! my pedigree might fuck ya
No homo, take yo logo, and yo promo to an usher
To walk it down them church pews
I killed it had a curfew
A 6 p.m, a black p.m
Is all they seen, I tuck the murder weapon in my brain
My nigga, you know the drama I bring
Clinically Saddam Hussein
While fucking on a dime who sang
That's a famous bitch
Now tell me who you hangin' with
It's a Privaledge
To fuck with Kendrick and Kevin durant on some gangsta shit



[Outro: Kendrick Lamar]
Shitted on em
Man

And I take my time, to write these lines
Only aliens can see the signs
Jupiter's intruder, I'm, looking for another universe to climb
